ing: 1 (5 pound) boneless pork loin roast, trimmed of fat
n: Slow Cooker Cranberry and Muscadine Pork Roast
des: "This is such an easy way to make a tender, juicy pork roast.  My family loves it . . . even my 5-year-old. It's fancy enough to serve to guests, but so easy to make, so why wait for company?"
ins:
Put the pork roast into the crock of your slow cooker. Pour wine over the roast; add the cranberries and garlic. Season everything with salt and pepper.
Cook on Low 6 to 8 hours.
